price: 23.Eddeluk jaciim deqsitta giráh gita keenih escessa.
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهۡدُوهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi fa-ih'dūhum ilā ṣirāṭi al-jaḥīmi
